item.title: About inlining
item.description: Introduction For me, everytime I encounter the stituation and document myself about, I still end up with the same conclusions: Inlining is often to be misused in development, ending up in counter-productive and risky situations. I will try to summarize all the things which I believe we need to remember about inlining, giving pros, cons and situations to use it and to not use it.
